page.title: 10FACILITIES IN LITTLE BADDOW
page.content: Although Little Baddow is a very pleasant environment in which to live the people would like to see more facilities available for their use. The younger girls can join the Brownies but there ie very little entertainment for the older children. The irregularity of bus services to the village also makes shopping and social life difficult for old people. Due to changing education policies the village school was closed in 1960. The only school in the village now is Elm Green School which is privately run and the majority of the village children travel to Danbury to primary school and to the larger schools of Chelmsford for their secondary education. Despite these problems the consensus of opinion is that Little Baddow is a lovely place to live and few of its people would wish to move.
